Hi,

Whens the server determines that it cannot return a requested resource  
(4xx/5xx), is it OK/sufficient with regard to RESTful webapps to just  
send the status code, some appropriate headers (i.e. no content) and  
rely on the client to interpret it?

thanks,
-Rob
